entries.waypoint_description_1: An island where former members of CorSec have set up a base of operations for their thievery.
entries.player_reset: I've decided not to look for it.
entries.player_2_1: Sorry... I don't do anything unofficial.
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the Rogue Corsec encampment?
entries.npc_reset: That might be wise. But even so - the very idea of wholesome justice dies today... along with your courage.
entries.npc_4_1: My former partner, and best friend at that, apparently has gone
. He joined up with a group of former agents that have decided to go into business for themselves. Not only that, he stole quite a number of weapons from the armory before he left. GRRrrrr!
entries.npc_3_1: Well, at least you're better than those rogues are. Thanks for your honesty.
entries.npc_2_1: Here's where you can find the island all those thugs are using as a
. If you find you have the time, go show them what happens to traitors!
entries.npc_1_1: I can't believe it!! Aarrrgh! If he weren't my friend, I'd go do it myself. Huh? Oh, sorry... didn't see you there. Hey! Are you interested in unofficially helping the remaining
